about_the_game:
DearMyFriend is a beautifully pixel-art and story-driven sandplay exploration game developed by GuluGames.



On an ordinary day, a train from another world slowly stopped outside the classroom, as if sensing the call of lonely girl.
Stepping onto the train, the light and wind of the golden continent rushed towards you, indicating the beginning of your adventure.
At this moment, you would not know your footsteps would cover every corner of the continent, and the songs in the wind would sing your name.


The golden continent filled with maple leaves, the bitterly cold valley blanketed in endless snow, the deep abyss of dark flames, or the land of civilization high above the clouds... You will wander diverse areas of the Stargather Land, weave together the ancient tales behind the continent of stars.

Of course, interspersed between these exciting adventures is your dull real life. Sometimes you have to return to your small room, but this may let you figure out what you really want.



Battle is not just about using brute force as you know. Here are some combat suggestions from Stargather Envoy:
Observe carefully and find the chance to defeating the enemy quickly;
Allocate stamina reasonably, use different elemental powers at the right time, crush your enemies with one hit.

It seems you already know this. Stargather Land never let you down.
You have chances to take on an advanced challenge after you finished the normal one.



Numerous treasures and accessories are scattered throughout the Stargather Land, where never disappoint the brave. So find them as much as possible and try to use them, which will add endless richness to your adventures!

This is a fascinating fantasy world and a gripping growth story.
On the journey, there is always a moment that makes you stop and admire.
